title: DIO 1983-12-28 Selland Arena, Fresno, California FLAC SDB
description:
DIO 1983-12-28 Selland Arena, Fresno, California (sbd.Lyn.cdr)

Selland Arena, 
Fresno, California, USA
Wednesday - December 28, 1983

Opening Bands:
Y & T
Rough Cutt

==============================================================

(Sounds like it was originally a vinyl source)

CDR trade with Lyn > Nero Burning ROM > Wav > Flac8

70:06 minutes 

==============================================================

01. Intro (02:01)
02. Stand Up and Shout (03:18)
03. Straight Through the Heart (05:02)
04. Shame on the Night (04:26)
05. Children of the Sea (07:17)
06. Holy Diver (05:37)
07. Vinny Appice Drum Solo (04:03)
08. Rainbow in the Dark > Band Introductions (05:05)
09. Heaven and Hell (includes Vivian Campbell Guitar Solo) (19:25)
10. Don't Talk to Strangers (05:17)
11. Man on the Silver Mountain (includes Starstruck) (08:30)


Ronnie James Dio - Vocals
Vinny Appice - Drums
Jimmy Bain - Bass
Vivian Campbell - Guitar
Claude Schnell - Keyboards

==============================================================
killerwolf13 notes:

After "Straight Through the Heart". Ronnie says "Hello Fresno. It's been a couple years since I've been back here." > Shame on the Night

After "Children of the Sea". Ronnie "Last night we were in Bakersfield. And in Bakersfield I said something about Fresno..." > Holy Diver

Ronnie also mentions Fresno during the Heaven & Hell "On & On" part with the audience & that some of Black Sabbath's Live Evil was recorded here.


After MOTSM. Fades out as Ronnie is saying "We love playing for you..."

To me it seems there may have been some editing or commercial breaks previously between some of these tracks.
==============================================================


Some sources suggest the date for Fresno, CA was October 16th or 17th, but both of those dates are incorrect. 
Holy Diver tour stopped just once in Fresno, CA and it was on December 28th.
